meanings.definition: Capable of being done or put into practice.
meanings.sent1: The simple instructions made the task practicable for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The team found a practicable solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: It seemed almost too practicable to believe it would work.
meanings.sent4: Her practicable approach to the project impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The practicable plan was so clear, it stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: Suitable for a particular purpose; feasible.
meanings.sent1: The practicable tools in the kit made the job easier.
meanings.sent2: The practicable route was the shortest way to the destination.
meanings.sent3: His practicable idea saved the day in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: The practicable solution was like a light in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The practicable choice was so obvious, it was hard to miss.
